de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.query.preprocessing
Class TmqlQueryTransformer

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.query.preprocessing.TmqlQueryTransformer

public class TmqlQueryTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

Query transformer class to cleaned query by removing unnecessary white-spaces and add necessary white-spaces.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Constant Field Values

patterns

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> patterns
List of internal system tokens which can isolate without use protection of other tokens

specials

private static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> specials
Map of special internal system tokens which can not isolate without use protection of other tokens. Map contains internal tokens mapping to the protected tokens, for example the tilde-token '~' can isolate any time except as a part of the tokens '~~>' , '<~~' or '=~'

Constructor Detail

TmqlQueryTransformer

public TmqlQueryTransformer()
Method Detail

transform

public static final java.lang.String transform(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                               java.lang.String query)
Internal transformer method to remove unnecessary whitespace or insert missing once. Method works iterative over all tokens by splitting them.

First all unprotected tokens would be isolate by inserting whitespace.

Second all new tokens would be check for valid URIs or XML nodes. If some URIs or XML found the URI would be isolate from token and the second step will be repeated for the other tokens. Otherwise the tokens would be checked for protected tokens.

Parameters:
runtime - the TMQL4J runtime
query - the string representation of the TMQL Query
Returns:
the transformed string representation of the TMQL Query

clean

private static java.lang.String clean(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                      java.lang.String token)
Transformation of TMQL tokens

First all unprotected tokens would be isolate by inserting whitespace.

Second all new tokens would be check for valid URIs or XML nodes. If some URIs or XML found the URI would be isolate from token and the second step will be repeated for the other tokens. Otherwise the tokens would be checked for protected tokens.

Parameters:
runtime - the TMQL4J runtime
token - the token to transform

uriProtectionAlgorithm

private static java.lang.String uriProtectionAlgorithm(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                                       java.lang.String token)
Internal URI and XML Protection algorithm. Method isolate all URIs and XML nodes from given token and replace protected tokens by checking all tokens of their protection list.

Parameters:
runtime - the TMQL4J runtime
token - the token to transform

transformSecure

private static java.lang.String transformSecure(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                                java.lang.String token)
Replace protected tokens by checking all tokens of their protection list.

Parameters:
runtime - the TMQL4J runtime
token - the token to transform

transformPatterns

private static java.lang.String transformPatterns(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                                  java.lang.String token)
Method to transform all tokens without protection.

Parameters:
runtime - the TMQL4J runtime
token - the token to transform

isProtected

private static boolean isProtected(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                   java.lang.String token)
Method simply checks if given token representing an URI ,XML node or simply a string. It also checks if the given URI is relative.

Parameters:
runtime - the TMQL4J runtime
token - the token to check
Returns:
true if given token is an absolute or relative URI or a XML node, false otherwise
